prompt: Welcome to Joja Online Shopping Centre, What can I help you
mail_format: Thank you for using Joja Global. The following are the items you have bought on the previous day, please check the following package! Note that after receiving this package, Joja will not be responsible for any damages including any loss or defect of the itmes in this package. %item id _ofts.jojaExp.item.package.global 1 %%[letterbg 4]
item.package.descrip.global: A global express package sent by JojaExpress, right-click to open
item.package.descrip.local: An express package sent by JojaExpress, right-click to open
item.package.descrip.whole: An express package sent by JojaExpress, Seems to have a lot of stuff in it. Right-click to open.
item.package.descrip.joln: An express package sent by JOLN. You can feel a lot of knowledge in it! Right-click to open
item.package.descrip.packed: A box of packed {{name}}, it looks like a lot. It seems that it can be opened directly, better than Mr. Qi's Mystery Box.
item.jpad.descrip: A Pad made by Joja Corporation (Better than IPad!) Can be used for online shopping
fee_NoJoja_tip: Extra carriage fees when joja goes out of business, in percentage
fee_Member_tip: Extra carriage fees when you have a membership, in percentage
openByKey: Can open shop using key bind
openByMobilePhone: Can open shop using mobile phone
openByPhone_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using Phone
openByKey_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using key bind
openByPad_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using JPad
openByMobilePhone_tooltip: Allow player to open the shop using mobile phone(from MobilePhoneContinued)
wholesale_page_tooltip: Configure items selling at Joja Wholesale
CloseWhenCCComplete: Close Joja Community When Community Centre is completed
sorry: Sorry, it seems that no services are avaliable now. You may need to change the configuration.
app.title: Joja Express
local_help: Joja Community is an online shopping service based on the Joja Marts in the communities. You can browse and shop every product from every shop in your community. Your products will be delivered using various methods provided by the local joja manager within the day. Joja Community only provide long-term and stable products. Temporary and random products are not available at Joja Community. This service is unavailable for all communities that have no operating Joja Marts near them.
global_help: Joja Global allows you to by everything around the globe using the cheapest price. We ensure you to obtain the most cheap and fine products. Because we use International long-distance freight, there will be a small portion of carriage fee, currently is {{percent}} of your total price. Products purchased through Joja Global will be delivered through mail on the next day.
qi_help: Joja | Qi is a collaborative project with Mr. Qi, providing everything in Mr. Qi's shop.
whole_help: Joja Wholesale is a place for large-quantity purchasing. Joja Wholesale only offer some common resources (like woods, stone, ores, or seeds), and only provide large-scale purchasing, but the overall price will be lower than normal markets with maximum 50%-off
joln_help: Joja Online Learning Network, or JOLN is an online learning network offering cooking and crafting class, and you can learn new recipes in JOLN. We also sell books. After you purchased our services we will play the courses you ordered and mail the books you bought.
search.none: Did not find anything related to "{{search}}"
wait: Maybe I should wait for my last package to arrive before continue shopping
unexpClose.0: Are you sure to exit without checking out?
noMoney.0: Warning: Your payment account balance is not enough to pay for the products in your cart.
newCooking: You have learned new cooking recipe!
newCrafting: You have learned new crafing recipe!
